(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Recently))
    (ADVP (RB there))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (NP
          (NP (JJ several) (NNS shops))
          (VP (VBG offering)
            (NP
              (NP (NNP Sarawak) (NNP Kolo) (NNP mee))
              (SBAR
                (S
                  (S (CC but)
                    (NP (DT these))
                    (VP (VBP sell)
                      (NP (PRP$ their) (NNP Kolo) (NN mee))
                      (PP (IN at)
                        (NP (NNP Cafe) (NNS prices)))))
                  (CC and)
                  (S
                    (NP (DT the) (JJ last) (NN time))
                    (NP (PRP I))
                    (VP (VBD ate)
                      (NP (NNP Kolo) (NNP Mee)))))))))))
    (, ,)))


advmod(shops-6, Recently-1)
advmod(shops-6, there-2)
aux(shops-6, has-3)
cop(shops-6, been-4)
amod(shops-6, several-5)
root(ROOT-0, shops-6)
partmod(shops-6, offering-7)
nn(mee-10, Sarawak-8)
nn(mee-10, Kolo-9)
dobj(offering-7, mee-10)
cc(sell-13, but-11)
nsubj(sell-13, these-12)
rcmod(mee-10, sell-13)
poss(mee-16, their-14)
nn(mee-16, Kolo-15)
dobj(sell-13, mee-16)
prep(sell-13, at-17)
nn(prices-19, Cafe-18)
pobj(at-17, prices-19)
cc(sell-13, and-20)
det(time-23, the-21)
amod(time-23, last-22)
nsubj(ate-25, time-23)
nsubj(ate-25, I-24)
conj(sell-13, ate-25)
nn(Mee-27, Kolo-26)
dobj(ate-25, Mee-27)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP
      (VP (VBD felt)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (DT the) (NN meat) (NN sauce))
            (VP (VBD was)
              (ADJP
                (NP (DT a) (RB bit))
                (JJ salty))))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBZ overpowers)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN taste))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (NNS noodles))))))
    (. .)))

mark(salty-10, that-3)
det(sauce-6, the-4)
nn(sauce-6, meat-5)

cop(salty-10, was-7)
det(bit-9, a-8)
npadvmod(salty-10, bit-9)
ccomp(felt-2, salty-10)
cc(felt-2, and-11)
conj(felt-2, overpowers-12)
det(taste-14, the-13)
dobj(overpowers-12, taste-14)
prep(taste-14, of-15)
det(noodles-17, the-16)
pobj(of-15, noodles-17)


(ROOT
  (S (CC So)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (ADJP (RB very) (JJ delighted)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB find)
              (NP
                (NP (DT this) (NN stall))
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP
                    (NP (NNP Tampines) (NNP Round) (NNP Market))
                    (SBAR
                      (WHNP (WDT that))
                      (S
                        (VP (VBZ sells)
                          (NP (NNP Kolo) (NNP Mee))))))))
              (, ,))))))))

  (S
    (NP (NNP Kolo) (NNP Mee))
    (ADVP (RB actually))
    (VP (VBZ tastes)
      (ADJP (JJ different)
        (PP (IN from)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN mee))
            (SBAR
              (S
                (NP (PRP we))
                (VP (VBP are)
                  (VP (VBN used)
                    (S
                      (VP (TO to)))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ My) (JJ only) (NN question))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (SBAR (IN that) (IN if)
        (S
          (NP (NN mee))
          (VP (MD can)
            (VP (VB be)
              (VP (VBN made)
                (PP (IN without) (`` ``)
                  (NP (NNP Kee))
                  ('' ''))
                (SBAR
                  (WHADVP (WRB why))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
                      (ADVP (RBR more)
                        (NP (NNS people)))
                      (VP (VB make)
                        (NP (PRP it))
                        (SBAR (IN that)
                          (S
                            (NP
                              (NP (NN way))
                              (PP (IN since)
                                (NP
                                  (NP (DT a) (NN lot))
                                  (PP (IN of)
                                    (NP (NNS people))))))
                            (VP (VBP complain)
                              (PP (IN about)
                                (NP
                                  (NP (DT the) (NN smell))
                                  (PP (IN of)
                                    (NP
                                      (NP (`` ``) (NNS alkali) ('' ''))
                                      (PP (IN in)
                                        (NP
                                          (ADJP (RB poorly) (VBN made))
                                          (NNS noodles))))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

amod(question-3, only-2)
nsubj(is-4, question-3)
root(ROOT-0, is-4)
